constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 42 (Wednesday, March 9, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. SHERMAN:
H.R. 7049.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
The power granted to Congress under Article I, Section 8,
Clauses 1 and 18 of the United States Constitution.
[Page H1425]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

title: Mortgage Borrower Protection Act of 2022
